title: Walk to LIRR Train, MTA bus, Taxi, School
posting_body: ['Video Tour:', '<URL>', '(old pics/videos.', 'New pics soon.', 'AC included, no sofa.)', '222nd st 95th ave. 2 bedroom top level apartment.', 'Water included.', 'If you would like to save on TV/Wifi/Phone, verizon fios can be shared for an extra $35/mo ($150 value which includes 50/50mb wifi, tv preferred package 315+ channels, and 1 box).', 'Please check that you meet the requirements below.', 'If so, send an email sharing annual gross income (savings if substantial), credit score, and job.', 'YOU MAY NOT GET A RESPONSE IF YOU DON’T', 'DO THIS IN YOUR 1ST EMAIL.', 'REQUIREMENTS:', "1st month rent, 1 month security, and credit/background check to move in (I don't recall cost", "but it's about $20-70)", '-Income/credit/background check.', 'Looking for tenants with gross income of 3x rent, credit above 640, and no past criminal activity that may affect our relation.', 'If these requirements are not met, please offer a higher security deposit.', '-No indoor smoking, pets, or excessive noise (especially after 8:30PM) without approval.', 'Previous tenant left because they have a young kid they’d allow to make excessive noise (even after 8:30PM), disturbing tenants below.', 'They didn’t want to fix the issue and thought it’s ok to do.', 'While I can’t say “no young noisy kids”, know that the kids were causing much noise at night.', 'Be respectful of noise levels.', 'Short walk to LIRR long island railroad, MTA bus (q36 and n24 to subway F train, q110), taxi, and supermarket.', 'Diverse area with school across the street.', 'Private entrance.', "Street parking's easy but side parking and yard can be shared."]
